overview: While wiring an internet Sex-House for cameras, Dave finds a strange girl in the basement. Thinking she's just a remnant partygoer from the night before, he doesn't think anything of it. What he doesn't know is that Julianna is really a princess from the 14th century who has been under a spell for centuries. Relishing in her new environment, Julianna eagerly participates in the carnal pleasures offered her. Can a princess from the 14th century find love and happiness in 2001? Who cares, she just wants to have a good time trying!
title: The New Girl
